name: KeepMovingThenNobodyExplodes
description:
Hi,Everyong! I'm a 35 years old solo developer, and this is my first game made by Gamemaker Studio.Hope you like it. You can play it for free, any donation will be appreciated! [Special Thanks to Pixel-Boy who provided awesome game assets on itch]

Keep Moving and Survival in this BULLET HELL game with INFINITE levels!
This is a One-Thumb Game.Collect coins and dodge bullets in infinite levels!

[How to Control]
Tap and drag to move.

[Items in Level]
Red Treasure Box : will give you a lot of coins.
Blue Treasure Box : will give you a shield which can protect you from bullets in a limited period.
